user_query: I'm organizing a motorcycle event in North Carolina and I need to find nearby hotels for the participants. Can you suggest some hotels in North Carolina? Also, provide me with the gas prices in North Carolina so I can inform the participants about the current fuel costs. Additionally, I would like to know the walk scores and bike infrastructure ratings for the event location.

TaskList.description: Find hotels near the event location in North Carolina for participants.
Retrieve current gas prices in North Carolina.
Gather walk scores for the event location.
Get bike infrastructure ratings for the event location.
